text: Tatyana Mikhailovna Karpova (; 17 January 1916 – 26 February 2018) was a Soviet and Russian stage and film actress. Born in what became Kharkiv, Ukraine, on 17 January 1916, Karpova began acting at the age of 13. She joined the Mayakovsky Theatre in 1938. In 1960, Karpova was named a People’s Artist of the RSFSR, and designated a People's Artist of the USSR in 1990. She retired in 2003, and died in Moscow at the age of 102 on 26 February 2018. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1916 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Soviet stage actresses Category:Actors from Kharkiv Category:Russian centenarians Category:People's Artists of the RSFSR Category:People's Artists of the USSR Category:Women centenarians
title: Tatyana Karpova
